2018-03-27-welcome-to-jekyll.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
2018-03-27-welcome-to-jekyll.body:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

{% highlight ruby %} def print_hi(name) puts "Hi, #{name}" end print_hi('Tom')

#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT. {% endhighlight %}

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.

about.title: About
about.body:
This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for Minima at GitHub: jekyll / minima

You can find the source code for Jekyll at GitHub: jekyll / jekyll

living.title: Living
living.list:
• Floor to ceiling windows and sliding doors to patios
  • Covered patios for each unit, (XX sq ft - xx sq ft)
  • 2 elevators
  • HVAC maintained by building
  • Resident choice for cable and internet provider
  • Public wifi available on 1st floor lobby and guest rooms

community.list:
• Pool & outdoor lounge area
  • Gym & Sauna
  • Party Room available for rent (XX sq ft)

security.title: Security
security.list:
• 24 hour locked entry doors
  • Voice & video communication and entry access control from units
  • Video monitoring
  • Secure parking areas for residence

comfort.title: Comfort & Elegance
comfort.text: Our condominiums are perfect for those individuals seeking a relatively maintenance-free lifestyle in a secure and elegant community.
